variant.p: This Interpretation applies to changes in the measurement of any existing decommissioning, restoration or similar liability that is both:

li.p: recognised as part of the cost of an item of property, plant and equipment in accordance with IAS 16 or as part of the cost of a right-of-use asset in accordance with IFRS 16 ; and
recognised as a liability in accordance with IAS 37.

variant.p: For example, a decommissioning, restoration or similar liability may exist for decommissioning a plant, rehabilitating environmental damage in extractive industries, or removing equipment.
